price: ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ߞߏ ߘߏ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߐߛߎ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߕߊ߬ ߞߎߟߎ߲߫ ߖߛߐߣߍ߲ ߞߣߐ߫
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
